headline: Trump endorses J.D. Vance in hotly contested Ohio Senate primary
sentences: A source close to Mandels campaign said they'd tried to sway Trump from endorsing Vance by sharing an internal poll that showed Mandel would be in front of the field with 33 percent of the vote if he had Trump's endorsement, followed by Matt Dolan and Mike Gibbons tied at 15 percent, and then Vance and Timken both at 9 percent.

NBC News was first to report on Thursday that Trump was planning to endorse Vance, and had been holding off under intense pressure from the rival Republican campaigns of Josh Mandel and Jane Timken, sources said.
